imageprocessing.text_recognition package¶

Submodules¶

imageprocessing.text_recognition.ocr_azure module¶

Module implementing test ADT to use Microsoft Azure API

class imageprocessing.text_recognition.ocr_azure.ImageInfo(img_path: str)¶

Bases: object

Data structure designed to represent the image as a binary array

class imageprocessing.text_recognition.ocr_azure.OCR(img_directory: str, output_file_name: str, api_key: str, language: Optional[str] = 'en')¶

Bases: object

ADT that enables text recognition of any amount of images stored in one directory. Takes path to the directory with stored images, name of the file to store the recognized text and optionally language of the recognition when created the instance of the ADT …

ENDPOINT: str

Another obligatory element to use API

img_directory¶

directory where images are stored. Note: works even if there are other files except the images in the directory

Type

str

filename¶

string that defines the name of the file that will contain the recognized text

Type

str

api_key¶

Key to Microsoft Azure API. Necessary to use API

Type

str

language¶

optional parameter defining the text language to be recognized. Default value is ‘en’ for English. Possible values include: ‘en’, ‘es’, ‘fr’, ‘de’, ‘it’, ‘nl’, ‘pt’. Azure OCR v. 3.2 is awaited to be implemented in the code to support over 70 languages in near future.

Type

Optional[str]

headers¶

dictionary that defines headers to get send requests from Azure API

Type

dict

params¶

dictionary containing parameters of the request to the API

Type

dict

get_text(pathToImage)¶

sends request to the API and returns information from json converted into the python dictionary. Takes a full path to the image, which is got as concatenation of the directory + the name of the file inside the directory

parse_text()¶

parses the json and gets the text from the image.

handler()¶

iterates over each file within a directory, sends requests to the API to recognize text, gets the recognized text and saves it into the file.

ENDPOINT = 'https://westeurope.api.cognitive.microsoft.com/vision/v1.0/ocr'¶
